snippet: The new model has a coddling suspension that mercifully shrugs off rough roads, and the brand’s new face gives the car a modern look....
abstract: Driven column review of Buick LaCrosse sedan.
lead_paragraph: The new model has a coddling suspension that mercifully shrugs off rough roads, and the brand’s new face gives the car a modern look.

headline.print_headline: A Pampered Place to Endure Gridlock
headline.main: Video Review: With the LaCrosse, Buick Continues to Pamper
